strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Cozy Dev Log' carousel format transforms dry technical updates (CSV fixes, KPIs, cleanup) into a narrative of tending a digital garden. The pixel art style (Stardew Valley vibes) softens the 'tech' aspect, making the platform feel approachable and warm, aligning with the 'no BS, free art' brand identity.
